name: Héchéng Dà Xīguā
summary: Synthetic Big Watermelon is a Chinese web browser game developed by Micro Umbrella Games that went viral on WeChat. It originated the concept which was later used in the very popular "Suika Game" and inspiring many games like it.

name: Hélène est dans mon Ventre.
summary: You follow a troubled girl whose only friend is her talking tapeworm inside her belly. This one will help and advise her in order for her to get closer to the person she loves.
